Name: Verify Navigation from Cart to Apple Category Page
Description: Navigate to the cart and click on the Apple category link. Verify that the category page loads correctly.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to cart
Step 2: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Product Page for iPhone 15 New
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select the Apple link, and click on the iPhone 15 New product. Verify that the product page displays correctly.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object2
Step 3: Click on link Apple2 -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 4: Click on link iPhone15New -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/*'
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Complete Checkout Process for Apple iPhone Cases
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select an iPhone case, and add it to the cart. Fill in shipping details and complete the order, then verify the thank you page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'iphone cases category#*/*'
Step 4: Click on button AddToCart
Step 5: Click on link PlaceOrder -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 6: Click on link GoToCart
Step 7: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 8: Hover over div object
Step 9: Click on input Email
Step 10: Enter input value in input Email
Step 11: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 12: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 13: Click on input FirstName
Step 14: Hover over div CheckoutInfo2
Step 15: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 16: Click on input LastName
Step 17: Hover over div CheckoutInfo3
Step 18: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 19: Click on input Address
Step 20: Hover over div CheckoutInfo4
Step 21: Enter input value in input Address
Step 22: Click on input ZipCode
Step 23: Hover over div CheckoutInfo5
Step 24: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 25: Click on input City
Step 26: Hover over div CheckoutInfo6
Step 27: Enter input value in input City
Step 28: Click on input State
Step 29: Hover over div CheckoutInfo7
Step 30: Enter input value in input State
Step 31: Click on input Phone
Step 32: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 33: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 34: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/*'
Step 35: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Test Multiple Actions Including Purchase and Navigation
Description: Navigate to the homepage, add a product to the cart, and perform various actions including changing options and verifying navigation to different pages.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button AddToCart
Step 3: Click on label colorStorageOption (512GB)
Step 4: Click on label colorStorageOption (Yellow)
Step 5: Click on button purchaseAction (Increased)
Step 6: Click on button purchaseAction (Increased)
Step 7: Click on button purchaseAction (Buy)
Step 8: Click on link Phone -> Navigate to page 'phone category#*/*'
Step 9: Click on link Twitter
Step 10: Click on link ContactNumber
Step 11: Click on link About -> Navigate to page '/about'
Step 12: Click on link Address -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 13: Hover over div object
Step 14: Click on input Email -> Navigate to page ''
Step 15: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
